translations: v．闲荡，游荡：无所事事地度过时间，尤指在公共场所或他人家中。
· He dossed around all day, doing nothing.

sentences.sentence: It was too late to go home so he dossed down on the floor.
sentences.translation: 要回家已经太迟了，所以他便打地铺将就睡下了。

sentences.sentence: It was here that we dossed down for our first night in the forest.
sentences.translation: 我们就是在这儿凑合着睡下，在森林里度过了我们的第一个夜晚。
